summary: The Department of Defense's contracts for services totaled more than $190 billion in FY 2019. We have highlighted service acquisitions as an oversight issue within our DOD contract management High Risk area since 2001. The DOD reported to Congress in October 2020 on actions it took, or plans to take, to address many key issues we have identified in prior work. One remaining unresolved issue...
title: Service Acquisitions: DOD's Report to Congress Identifies Steps Taken to Improve Management, But Does Not Address Some Key Planning Issues
